verbs.description: As [ARG1: fallout from the report] [V: continued] [ARGM-LOC: in Washington] , Comey grinned next to the bountifully - bearded gnome and even completed the photo with a Trump - style pointing gesture towards his unlikely companion .

[ARGM-TMP: As fallout from the report continued in Washington] , [ARG0: Comey] [V: grinned] [ARGM-LOC: next to the bountifully - bearded gnome] and even completed the photo with a Trump - style pointing gesture towards his unlikely companion .

[ARGM-TMP: As fallout from the report continued in Washington] , [ARG0: Comey] grinned next to the bountifully - bearded gnome and [ARGM-ADV: even] [V: completed] [ARG1: the photo] [ARGM-MNR: with a Trump - style pointing gesture towards his unlikely companion] .
